channel.title: Homepage on Vysaaria
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Vysaaria

item.title: Intro
item.description: Welcome to the Vysaaria site! This is my far from my first attempt to create a Wiki for Vysaaria, but this is the first time I’ve tried a Static Website to accomplish this.

item.title: Kingdom of Vysaaria
item.description: Overview # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd"> Created with Fabric.js 5.3.0 Vysaaria is a Federal Parliamentary Semi-Constitutional Monarchy1 situated along most of the southern coast of the Continent of Aloria. Officially known as the Kingdom and Lands of the Vysaarii People, it consists of 11 provinces, and a single Autonomous Protectorate2 known as Kyrilia. These seperate polities are broadly united through history, culture and geography, having developed alongside eachother and even fought in the past.

item.title: Konstyentyn Aleksandar III
item.description: I’m lazy… This part of the site isn’t done yet! Overview # Konstyentyn Aleksandar III (Konstentyn Aleksandar; born 10 August 11,898) is the current King of <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd"> Created with Fabric.js 5.3.0 Vysaaria and Lord Protector of <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd"> Created with Fabric.js 5.3.0 Kyrilia. Konstentyn was born in Pylatze Rynakt during the reign of his uncle, King Dietryk II.
